Package ca.phon.xml

Interface XMLSerializer

public interface XMLSerializer
XML Serializer.

  • Method Summary

    java.lang.Class<?> declaredType()
    The type handled by this serializer.
    <T> T read​(java.lang.Class<T> type, java.io.InputStream input)
    Read an object of type declaredType() from the given InputStream.
    <T> void write​(java.lang.Class<T> type, T obj, java.io.OutputStream output)
    Write an object of type declaredType() to the given OutputStream as xml data.
